author: David Strohl
text: If you use a standardized form or a standardized memo format for staff to use to communicate to the Board/Council regarding agenda items, could you please provide me with a copy?  Please send to dstrohl@forsythvillage.us.  Thanks in advance for your assistance.
title: Agenda Item Communications
